html:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Wall Street securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several U.S.-listed companies, including Api Group, Apria and Zynga, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Api Group Corp APG.N: Baird cuts to neutral rating

* Apria Inc APR.O: Piper Sandler cuts to neutral from overweight

* Certara Inc CERT.O: Jefferies raises to buy from hold

* Las Vegas Sands Corp LVS.N: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Zynga Inc ZNGA.O: Credit Suisse raises to neutral from underperform

Following is a summary of research actions on U.S. companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
